config.introduction: Siin saab seadistada oma komponente ja Home Assistant'i. Mitte kõike ei saa veel kasutajaliidese kaudu seadistada, kuid me töötame selle nimel.

editor.confirm_unsaved: Sul on salvestamata muudatusi. Oled kindel, et soovid lahkuda?

area_registry.caption: Alade register

picker.introduction: Alasid kasutatakse seadmete paiknemise korraldamiseks. Seda teavet kasutatakse läbivalt kasutajaliidese, lubade ja teiste süsteemidega sidumise korraldamisel.
picker.introduction2: Seadmete paigutamiseks alale mine alloleva lingi kaudu sidumiste lehele ja seejärel klõpsa seadme kaartideni jõudmiseks seadistatud sidumisel.
picker.no_areas: Paistab, et sul pole veel alasid!

area_registry.no_areas: Paistab, et sul pole veel alasid!

core.introduction: Seadete muutmine võib olla väsitav tegevus. Me teame. See osa püüab su elu natuke hõlpsamaks teha.

core_config.edit_requires_storage: Redaktor on keelatud, kuna seaded asuvad configuration.yaml failis.

reloading.heading: Seadete taaslaadimine
reloading.introduction: Mõned Home Assistant'i komponendid on taaslaetavad ilma taaskäivituseta. Taaslaadimise klõpsamisel tühistatakse nende praegused seaded ja laetakse uued.

validation.introduction: Kontrolli oma seadeid kui oled neis hiljuti muutusi teinud ja tahad veenduda, et kõik on korrektne

reloading.heading: Konfiguratsiooni taaslaadimine
reloading.introduction: Mõned Home Assistant'i komponendid on taaslaetavad ilma taaskäivituseta. Taaslaadimise klõpsamisel tühistatakse nende praegused seaded ja laetakse uued.

server_management.heading: Serveri haldamine
server_management.introduction: Kontrolli oma Home Assistant serverit... Home Assistant'ist.
server_management.confirm_restart: Oled kindel, et soovid taaskäivitada Home Assistant'i?
server_management.confirm_stop: Oled kindel, et soovid seisata Home Assistant'i?

customize.caption: Kohandamine

picker.introduction: Kohanda olemi atribuute. Lisatud või muudetud kohandused rakenduvad kohe. Eemaldatud kohandused rakenduvad olemi värskendamisel.

warning.include_sentence: It seems that your configuration.yaml doesn't properly
warning.not_applied: Changes made here are written in it, but will not be applied after a configuration reload unless the include is in place.

customize.attributes_customize: The following attributes are already set in customize.yaml
customize.attributes_outside: The following attributes are customized from outside of customize.yaml
customize.different_include: Possibly via a domain, a glob or a different include.
customize.attributes_set: The following attributes of the entity are set programmatically.
customize.attributes_override: You can override them if you like.
customize.attributes_not_set: The following attributes weren't set. Set them if you like.

picker.introduction: Automaatika redaktor võimaldab teil luua ja muuta automatiseeringuid. Palun järgige allolevat linki, veendumaks, et oled Home Assistant'i õigesti seadistanud.
picker.no_automations: Me ei leidnud ühtegi muudetavat automatiseeringut
picker.only_editable: Only automations defined in automations.yaml are editable.
picker.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this automation?

editor.introduction: Kasuta oma kodule elu sisse puhumiseks automatiseeringuid.
editor.load_error_not_editable: Ainult automations.yaml failis asuvad automatiseeringud on muudetavad.
editor.unsaved_confirm: Sul on salvestamata muudatusi. Oled kindel, et soovid lahkuda?

triggers.name: Trigger
triggers.introduction: Päästikud on need, millest algab automatiseeringu töö. Ühe automatiseeringu jaoks on võimalik määrata mitu päästikut. Kui päästik vallandub, kontrollib Home Assistant võimalike tingimuste täidetust ja käivitab tegevuse.

conditions.name: Condition
conditions.introduction: Tingimused on automatiseeringu valikuline osa ja neid saab kasutada, et vältida tegevuse käivitumist päästiku vallandumisel. Tingimused tunduvad väga sarnased päästikutele, kuid on siiski erinevad. Päästik jälgib süsteemis toimuvaid sündmusi, tingimus jälgib ainult süsteem praegust olekut. Päästik võib märgata, et lülitit ollakse parasjagu lülitamas. Tingimus võib näha ainult seda, kas lüliti on praegu sisse või välja lülitatud.

actions.name: Action
actions.introduction: Tegevused on need, mida Home Assistant teeb kui päästik käivitab automatiseeringu.

picker.introduction: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured Home Assistant correctly.
picker.no_scripts: We couldn’t find any editable scripts

editor.introduction: Use scripts to execute a sequence of actions.
editor.load_error_not_editable: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
editor.delete_confirm: Oled kindel, et soovid selle skripti kustutada?
editor.sequence_sentence: The sequence of actions of this script.

picker.introduction: The scene editor allows you to create and edit scenes. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured Home Assistant correctly.
picker.no_scenes: We couldn’t find any editable scenes
picker.only_editable: Only scenes defined in scenes.yaml are editable.
picker.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this scene?

editor.introduction: Use scenes to bring your home alive.
editor.load_error_not_editable: Only scenes in scenes.yaml are editable.
editor.unsaved_confirm: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
editor.name: Name

devices.introduction: Add the devices that you want to be included in your scene. Set all the devices to the state you want for this scene.

entities.introduction: Entities that do not belong to a devices can be set here.
entities.device_entities: If you add an entity that belongs to a device, the device will be added.

cloud.caption: Home Assistant pilv
cloud.description_features: Juhi kodust eemal viibides, seo Alexa ja Google Assistant'iga.

login.title: Pilve sisselogimine
login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
login.introduction2: This service is run by our partner
login.introduction2a: , a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant and Hass.io.
login.introduction3: Home Assistant Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
login.alert_password_change_required: You need to change your password before logging in.
login.alert_email_confirm_necessary: You need to confirm your email before logging in.

forgot_password.title: Unustasid salasõna
forgot_password.subtitle: Unustasid oma salasõna
forgot_password.instructions: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password.check_your_email: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.

register.title: Register Account
register.headline: Alusta tasuta prooviperioodi
register.information: Create an account to start your free one month trial with Home Assistant Cloud. No payment information necessary.
register.information2: The trial will give you access to all the benefits of Home Assistant Cloud, including:
register.feature_remote_control: Control of Home Assistant away from home
register.feature_webhook_apps: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
register.information3: This service is run by our partner
register.information3a: , a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant and Hass.io.
register.account_created: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.

account.thank_you_note: Thank you for being part of Home Assistant Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
account.integrations_introduction: Integrations for Home Assistant Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your Home Assistant instance publicly on the internet.

remote.title: Kaugjuhtimine
remote.access_is_being_prepared: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
remote.info: Home Assistant Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
remote.instance_will_be_available: Your instance will be available at

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
alexa.enable_ha_skill: Enable the Home Assistant skill for Alexa
alexa.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.info: With the Google Assistant integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
google.enable_ha_skill: Activate the Home Assistant skill for Google Assistant
google.info_state_reporting: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
google.enter_pin_info: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.

webhooks.title: Veebihaagid
webhooks.info: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to Home Assistant from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
webhooks.no_hooks_yet: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
webhooks.link_learn_more: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

google.title: Google Assistant
google.banner: Editing which entities are exposed via this UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.

dialog_cloudhook.managed_by_integration: This webhook is managed by an integration and cannot be disabled.
dialog_cloudhook.info_disable_webhook: Kui sa ei soovi enam seda veebihaaki kasutada, võid
dialog_cloudhook.confirm_disable: Oled kindel, et soovid selle veebihaagi keelata?

devices.caption: Seadmed
devices.details: Here are all the details of your device.
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids: Do you also want to rename the entity id's of your entities?

picker.introduction: Home Assistant peab registrit iga olemi kohta, mida ta kunagi näinud on ja mida saab üheselt tuvastada. Kõigile nendele olemitele antakse olemi ID, mis reserveeritakse ainult sellele olemile.
picker.introduction2: Kasuta olemite registrit olemi nime või ID muutmiseks või olemi eemaldamiseks Home Assistant'ist. Pane tähele, et olemi registrikirje eemaldamine ei eemalda olemit. Selleks järgi allolevat linki ja eemalda olem sidumiste lehelt.

editor.enabled_description: Keelatud olemeid ei lisata Home Assistant'i.
editor.confirm_delete: Oled kindel, et soovid selle kirje kustutada?
editor.confirm_delete2: Deleting an entry will not remove the entity from Home Assistant. To do this, you will need to remove the integration '{platform}' from Home Assistant.
editor.note: Note: this might not work yet with all integrations.

person.caption: Isikud
person.description: Halda isikuid, keda Home Assistant jälgib.
person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in Home Assistant.
person.note_about_persons_configured_in_yaml: Note: persons configured via configuration.yaml cannot be edited via the UI.
person.no_persons_created_yet: Paistab, et sa pole veel ühtegi isikut loonud.
person.confirm_delete: Oled kindel, et soovid selle isiku kustutada?
person.confirm_delete2: Kõik sellele isikule kuuluvad seadmed jäävad peremehetuks.

detail.name: Nimi
detail.device_tracker_intro: Vali seadmed, mis kuuluvad sellele isikule.
detail.no_device_tracker_available_intro: When you have devices that indicate the presence of a person, you will be able to assign them to a person here. You can add your first device by adding a presence-detection integration from the integrations page.

integrations.caption: Sidumised
integrations.note_about_integrations: Not all integrations can be configured via the UI yet.

config_entry.no_devices: See sidumine ei hõlma ühtegi seadet
config_entry.delete_confirm: Oled kindel, et soovid selle sidumise kustutada?
config_entry.restart_confirm: Selle sidumise lõplikuks eemaldamiseks taaskäivita Home Assistant

config_flow.not_all_required_fields: Not all required fields are filled in.

external_step.description: Selle etapi lõpetamine nõuab välise veebisaidi külastamist.

editor.caption: Vaata kasutajat
editor.system_generated_users_not_removable: Unable to remove system generated users.

add_device_page.discovery_text: Leitud seadmed kuvatakse siin. Järgige seadme(te) juhiseid ja pange seade sidumisrežiimile.

node_management.introduction: Run ZHA commands that affect a single device. Pick a device to see a list of available commands.
node_management.hint_battery_devices: Note: Sleepy (battery powered) devices need to be awake when executing commands against them. You can generally wake a sleepy device by triggering it.
node_management.hint_wakeup: Some devices such as Xiaomi sensors have a wake up button that you can press at ~5 second intervals that keep devices awake while you interact with them.
node_management.help_node_dropdown: Select a device to view per-device options.

clusters.help_cluster_dropdown: Atribuutide ja käskude vaatamiseks vali klaster.

cluster_attributes.help_attribute_dropdown: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
cluster_attributes.help_get_zigbee_attribute: Get the value for the selected attribute.
cluster_attributes.help_set_zigbee_attribute: Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.

services.reconfigure: Taasseadista (tervenda) ZHA seade. Kasuta seda, kui seadmega on probleeme. Kui seade on akutoitega, siis veendu, et see oleks ärkvel ja oleks valmis käske vastu võtma.
services.updateDeviceName: Anna sellele seadmele seadmete registris kohandatud nimi.

network_management.introduction: Käivita käske, mis mõjutavad Z-Wave võrku. Sa ei saa tagasisidet selle kohta, kas enamik käske õnnestus, kuid selle kontrollimiseks võid uurida OZW-logi.

ozw_log.introduction: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.

network_status.network_starting_note: Sõltuvalt võrgu suurusest võib see natuke aega võtta.
network_status.network_started_note_some_queried: Ärkvel sõlmedele on päringud tehtud. Uinuvatele sõlmedele tehakse päringud, kui nad ärkavad.
